programme.title: My Faith in Sport
programme.desc: Ummah is an Arabic word meaning "community” – an important concept in Islam as it encourages Muslims to support and help each other especially in times of need. Zakat is one of the most important aspects in Islam - it is the principle of giving back to a community/person that needs it more than you. This episode will look into Zakat around footballers Ali-Al Hamadi and Nadia Nadim and the role it plays in their lives. Al-Hamadi is the first Iraqi to play in the Premier League with a remarkable back story – his family escaped persecution in their homeland in the early 2000s before settling, as refugees, in Liverpool. programme.title: Liverpool vs Everton - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 5 - Mini match
programme.desc: Liverpool have lost just one of their last 28 home games against Everton in all competitions, winning each of their last four in a row since a 0-2 defeat in February 2021. Only from February 1933 to January 1937 have the Reds ever won five straight home matches against the Toffees. Everton have won just two of their last 29 Premier League Merseyside derbies against Liverpool and have failed to score in five of their last seven.

programme.title: Manchester United vs Chelsea - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 5 - Mini match
programme.desc: Manchester United are unbeaten in their last 12 Premier League home games against Chelsea since a 0-1 defeat in May 2013. Indeed, Chelsea’s win rate of 18% at Old Trafford in the Premier League is their lowest away to any side they have visited 10+ times in the competition. After their 1-0 win in May, Chelsea are looking for successive league victories over Manchester United for the first time since winning three in a row from November 2009 to March 2011 under Carlo Ancelotti. The Blues’ two wins in their last three league games versus the Red Devils are as many as their previous 17 beforehand.

programme.title: Olympique Marseille vs PSG - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 5 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Marseille and Paris SG will face each other for the 110th time in all competitions, the Parisian club having only played more against Monaco and Lyon. Marseille are winless in their last 12 home games against Paris SG in Ligue 1, their longest drought against a single opponent – that's more games without a win than in their first 33 home games against PSG. OM have not scored at the Vélodrome against their rivals for six L1 matches, also their longest streak against the same team.

programme.title: Olympique Marseille vs PSG - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 5 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Marseille and Paris SG will face each other for the 110th time in all competitions, the Parisian club having only played more against Monaco and Lyon. Marseille are winless in their last 12 home games against Paris SG in Ligue 1, their longest drought against a single opponent – that's more games without a win than in their first 33 home games against PSG. OM have not scored at the Vélodrome against their rivals for six L1 matches, also their longest streak against the same team.

programme.title: My Faith in Sport - Salah
programme.desc: Exploring the importance of prayer within Islam, the episode begins with an overview of our seven athletes as they introduce themselves and why Islam is so important to them. We are also introduced to Omar Sulieman, a notable Imam, who acts as narration throughout the series and a guiding voice on the key principles of Islam. The life and career of Sofyan Amrabat is explored, showcasing his role as a key part of the Fenerbahce team in Turkey and the Moroccan national side. The Atlas Lions’ run to the semi-finals of the FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022 is explored, with the impact that Salah played in the team’s belief and positivity throughout the tournament.

PAOK vs Maccabi Tel Aviv - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD1
programme.desc: The previous meetings between PAOK Salonika and Maccabi Tel Aviv were in qualifying for the 2004-05 UEFA Champions League – the Israeli side won both legs in the third qualifying round. Maccabi Tel Aviv’s only previous major European trip to Greece came in the 2023-24 UEFA Conference League, winning 4-1 at Olympiakos in the first leg. They lost the second leg 6-1 at home and were eliminated at the last 16 stage.

programme.title: PAOK vs Maccabi Tel Aviv - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD1
programme.desc: The previous meetings between PAOK Salonika and Maccabi Tel Aviv were in qualifying for the 2004-05 UEFA Champions League – the Israeli side won both legs in the third qualifying round. programme.title: Real Betis vs Nottingham Forest - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD1
programme.desc: This will be the first ever meeting between Real Betis and Nottingham Forest – the Spanish side have lost seven of nine previous European games against English teams, losing most recently in the 2025 UEFA Conference League final to Chelsea. In major European competition, Nottingham Forest’s only previous meeting with a Spanish club was in the Fairs Cup first round in 1961-62, losing 7-1 on aggregate to Valencia.

programme.title: Olympique Marseille vs PSG - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 5
programme.desc: Marseille and Paris SG will face each other for the 110th time in all competitions, the Parisian club having only played more against Monaco and Lyon. Marseille are winless in their last 12 home games against Paris SG in Ligue 1, their longest drought against a single opponent – that's more games without a win than in their first 33 home games against PSG. OM have not scored at the Vélodrome against their rivals for six L1 matches, also their longest streak against the same team.

programme.desc: Real Madrid have won 24 and drawn three of their last 27 home games against Espanyol in LaLiga, winning the last 10, the best unbeaten run and winning streak at home against Espanyol in their history in the competition. Espanyol have lost 108 of their 178 matches against Real Madrid in LaLiga, the highest number of defeats suffered by any team against another in the history of the competition.

programme.title: Brighton & Hove Albion vs Tottenham Hotspur - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 5 - Mini match
programme.desc: Brighton completed a Premier League double over Tottenham Hotspur last season – the only time they have ever won back-to-back league meetings with Spurs. Tottenham Hotspur have lost away to Brighton in both of the last two league seasons but have never before lost three successive visits.

programme.title: Manchester United vs Chelsea - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 5 - Mini match
programme.desc: Manchester United are unbeaten in their last 12 Premier League home games against Chelsea since a 0-1 defeat in May 2013. Indeed, Chelsea’s win rate of 18% at Old Trafford in the Premier League is their lowest away to any side they have visited 10+ times in the competition. After their 1-0 win in May, Chelsea are looking for successive league victories over Manchester United for the first time since winning three in a row from November 2009 to March 2011 under Carlo Ancelotti. The Blues’ two wins in their last three league games versus the Red Devils are as many as their previous 17 beforehand.

programme.title: Arsenal vs Manchester City - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 5 - Mini match
programme.desc: Arsenal have won two of their last four league meetings with Manchester City, as many as their previous 22 beforehand. The Gunners could win back-to-back league games against the Citizens for the first time since December 2015. Manchester City have lost both of their last two Premier League visits to Arsenal, as many as their previous 14 beforehand. It’s their longest losing run away to the Gunners since April 2009.

programme.title: Olympique Marseille vs PSG - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 5 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Marseille and Paris SG will face each other for the 110th time in all competitions, the Parisian club having only played more against Monaco and Lyon. Marseille are winless in their last 12 home games against Paris SG in Ligue 1, their longest drought against a single opponent – that's more games without a win than in their first 33 home games against PSG. programme.title: Olympique Marseille vs PSG - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 5 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Marseille and Paris SG will face each other for the 110th time in all competitions, the Parisian club having only played more against Monaco and Lyon. Marseille are winless in their last 12 home games against Paris SG in Ligue 1, their longest drought against a single opponent – that's more games without a win than in their first 33 home games against PSG. OM have not scored at the Vélodrome against their rivals for six L1 matches, also their longest streak against the same team.

programme.title: Nice vs Roma - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD1
programme.desc: This will be Nice’s first ever European meeting with Roma; the French side have previously lost each of their seven European matches against sides from Italy with the last coming in a 4-1 defeat to Lazio in last season’s UEFA Europa League. Roma have lost just two of their 11 games in European competition against French sides, winning four of their last five since March 2007.

programme.title: Arsenal vs. Manchester City - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: Arsenal have won two of their last four league meetings with Manchester City, as many as their previous 22 beforehand. The Gunners could win back-to-back league games against the Citizens for the first time since December 2015. Manchester City have lost both of their last two Premier League visits to Arsenal, as many as their previous 14 beforehand. It’s their longest losing run away to the Gunners since April 2009.

programme.title: Manchester United vs. Chelsea - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: Manchester United are unbeaten in their last 12 Premier League home games against Chelsea since a 0-1 defeat in May 2013. Indeed, Chelsea’s win rate of 18% at Old Trafford in the Premier League is their lowest away to any side they have visited 10+ times in the competition. After their 1-0 win in May, Chelsea are looking for successive league victories over Manchester United for the first time since winning three in a row from November 2009 to March 2011 under Carlo Ancelotti. The Blues’ two wins in their last three league games versus the Red Devils are as many as their previous 17 beforehand.

programme.title: Liverpool vs. Everton - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: Liverpool have lost just one of their last 28 home games against Everton in all competitions, winning each of their last four in a row since a 0-2 defeat in February 2021. Only from February 1933 to January 1937 have the Reds ever won five straight home matches against the Toffees. Everton have won just two of their last 29 Premier League Merseyside derbies against Liverpool and have failed to score in five of their last seven.

programme.desc: Showcasing the personalities who have shaped the Premier League era, in each episode we tell their unique story that will be sure to engage and entertain all fans.

programme.title: All Goals UEFA Champions League 2025/2026
programme.desc: All the goals in match day 1 of UEFA Champions league for season 2025-2026.

programme.title: Olympique Marseille vs PSG - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 5
programme.desc: Marseille and Paris SG will face each other for the 110th time in all competitions, the Parisian club having only played more against Monaco and Lyon. Marseille are winless in their last 12 home games against Paris SG in Ligue 1, their longest drought against a single opponent – that's more games without a win than in their first 33 home games against PSG. OM have not scored at the Vélodrome against their rivals for six L1 matches, also their longest streak against the same team.

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Espanyol - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 5
programme.desc: Real Madrid have won 24 and drawn three of their last 27 home games against Espanyol in LaLiga, winning the last 10, the best unbeaten run and winning streak at home against Espanyol in their history in the competition. Espanyol have lost 108 of their 178 matches against Real Madrid in LaLiga, the highest number of defeats suffered by any team against another in the history of the competition.

programme.title: Al Hilal SFC (KSA) vs Al Duhail SC (QAT) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD1 - Mini Ma
programme.desc: The AFC Champions League Elite is contested by Asia's top-division football clubs. programme.title: Brighton & Hove Albion vs Tottenham Hotspur - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 5 - Mini match
programme.desc: Brighton completed a Premier League double over Tottenham Hotspur last season – the only time they have ever won back-to-back league meetings with Spurs. Tottenham Hotspur have lost away to Brighton in both of the last two league seasons but have never before lost three successive visits.

programme.title: Olympique Marseille vs PSG - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 5 - Mini Match

OM have not scored at the Vélodrome against their rivals for six L1 matches, also their longest streak against the same team.

programme.title: Nice vs Roma - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD1
programme.desc: This will be Nice’s first ever European meeting with Roma; the French side have previously lost each of their seven European matches against sides from Italy with the last coming in a 4-1 defeat to Lazio in last season’s UEFA Europa League. Roma have lost just two of their 11 games in European competition against French sides, winning four of their last five since March 2007.

programme.title: AFC Bournemouth vs Newcastle United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 5
programme.desc: After their 4-1 win at St. James’ Park in January, Bournemouth could win back-to-back league meetings with Newcastle United for just the second time in their history, after November 2017. The Cherries are unbeaten in their last six Premier League games versus the Magpies. Newcastle have only lost one of their seven Premier League visits to Bournemouth, a loss rate of 14%. Among sides they have visited as many or more times in the competition, only at Wolves and Nottingham Forest have they lost a lower percentage of away games.

programme.title: Fulham vs Brentford - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 5
programme.desc: Fulham completed a Premier League double over Brentford last season and are looking to win three league games in a row over the Bees for the second time, after winning their first three clashes from 1928 to 1929. Brentford have lost two of their three Premier League visits to Craven Cottage, more than their previous 15 league trips to Fulham beforehand, while they could lose twice in a row at Fulham in the league for the first time since January 1954.

programme.title: Brighton & Hove Albion vs Tottenham Hotspur - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 5

programme.title: Manchester United vs Chelsea - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 5
programme.desc: Manchester United are unbeaten in their last 12 Premier League home games against Chelsea since a 0-1 defeat in May 2013. Indeed, Chelsea’s win rate of 18% at Old Trafford in the Premier League is their lowest away to any side they have visited 10+ times in the competition. After their 1-0 win in May, Chelsea are looking for successive league victories over Manchester United for the first time since winning three in a row from November 2009 to March 2011 under Carlo Ancelotti. The Blues’ two wins in their last three league games versus the Red Devils are as many as their previous 17 beforehand.

programme.title: Manchester United vs Chelsea - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 5
programme.desc: Manchester United are unbeaten in their last 12 Premier League home games against Chelsea since a 0-1 defeat in May 2013. After their 1-0 win in May, Chelsea are looking for successive league victories over Manchester United for the first time since winning three in a row from November 2009 to March 2011 under Carlo Ancelotti. The Blues’ two wins in their last three league games versus the Red Devils are as many as their previous 17 beforehand.

programme.title: Arsenal vs Manchester City - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 5
programme.desc: Arsenal have won two of their last four league meetings with Manchester City, as many as their previous 22 beforehand. The Gunners could win back-to-back league games against the Citizens for the first time since December 2015. Manchester City have lost both of their last two Premier League visits to Arsenal, as many as their previous 14 beforehand. It’s their longest losing run away to the Gunners since April 2009.

programme.title: Arsenal vs Manchester City - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 5
programme.desc: Arsenal have won two of their last four league meetings with Manchester City, as many as their previous 22 beforehand. programme.title: Burnley vs Nottingham Forest - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 5
programme.desc: Both sides have scored in six of the last seven league meetings between Burnley and Nottingham Forest, with the only exception a 1-0 win for the Clarets in the Championship in February 2016. After their 2-1 win at Turf Moor on the final day of the 2023-24 season, Nottingham Forest could win back-to-back league meetings against Burnley for the first time since September 2003, and first time in the top-flight since March 1967. The Tricky Trees have never previously won back-to-back league visits to Burnley, with this their 52nd trip.

programme.title: Liverpool vs Everton - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 5 - Mini match
programme.desc: Liverpool have lost just one of their last 28 home games against Everton in all competitions, winning each of their last four in a row since a 0-2 defeat in February 2021. Everton have won just two of their last 29 Premier League Merseyside derbies against Liverpool and have failed to score in five of their last seven.

programme.title: Real Betis vs Nottingham Forest - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD1
programme.desc: This will be the first ever meeting between Real Betis and Nottingham Forest – the Spanish side have lost seven of nine previous European games against English teams, losing most recently in the 2025 UEFA Conference League final to Chelsea. programme.title: Olympique Marseille vs PSG - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 5
programme.desc: Marseille and Paris SG will face each other for the 110th time in all competitions, the Parisian club having only played more against Monaco and Lyon. programme.title: Melbourne City FC (AUS) vs Sanfrecce Hiroshima (JPN) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - East M
programme.desc: This will be the first-ever AFC Champions League Elite meeting between Melbourne City and Sanfrecce Hiroshima; City are winless in each of their two games against Japanese opposition in the competition, while a win for Sanfrecce would see them beat Australian opponents in three consecutive games for the first time in competition history. Melbourne City are winless in each of their last three matches in the AFC Champions League Elite, their longest such run in the competition; in fact, they have begun each of their previous two campaigns in the competition with draws.

programme.title: Gangwon FC (KOR) vs Shanghai Shenhua FC (CHN) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - East MD1
programme.desc: This will be the first AFC Champions League Elite meeting between Gangwon and Shanghai Shenhua, with the former set to play their first-ever game in the competition; Shenhua have lost each of their last two matches against South Korean opposition in the Champions League Elite, another defeat here will see them equal their longest such run in competition history. Shanghai Shenhua lost their most recent AFC Champions League Elite match 0-4 to Kawasaki Frontale on 12 March 2025; failure to score against Gangwon will see them go scoreless in consecutive games for the first time in the competition since May 2011.

programme.title: FC Machida Zelvia (JPN) vs FC Seoul (KOR)- AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - East MD1
programme.desc: This will be the first ever AFC Champions League Elite meeting between Machida Zelvia and FC Seoul, with the former playing in the competition for the first time ever; four J1 teams have previously played their first ever AFC Champions League Elite game against K-League clubs and won two with each of those matches having mutiple goals. FC Seoul have scored in each of their last 11 AFC Champions League Elite matches; in fact, they have scored on the opening matchday in six of their previous eight participations in the competition, failing to do so in only 2015 and 2017.

programme.title: Buriram United (THA) vs Johor Darul Ta’zim FC (MAS) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - East MD
programme.desc: Buriram United are unbeaten in their three AFC Champions League Elite matches against Johor Darul Ta’zim, with the only goal scored in those matches coming in the most recent such game. programme.title: Al Ahli Saudi FC (KSA) vs PFC Nasaf (UZB) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD1
programme.desc: This will be the fifth AFC Champions League Elite meeting between Al-Ahli and Nasaf, with Nasaf’s only win coming in their most recent such game on 2 March 2016 ; Al-Ahli’s most recent game in the competition against Uzbek opposition was a 2-1 win over Pakhtakor Tashkent on 20 May 2019, a win here will see them win two consecutive such games for the first time in competition history. Al-Ahli are unbeaten in each of their last 18 AFC Champions League Elite games, including the final of the 2024-25 edition ; avoiding defeat here will see them equal Gamba Osaka for the joint third-longest such run in the competition.

programme.title: Al Shorta (IRQ) vs Al Sadd SC (QAT) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD1
programme.desc: This will be the first ever AFC Champions League Elite meeting between Al Shorta and Al Sadd; Iraqi teams have won five of their last seven matches against Qatari sides in the competition, after winning just one of the first seven. Al Shorta failed to win any of their first three matches against Qatari teams in the competition and did not score in those games, but they won their last such meeting 2-1 vs Al Duhail in April 2021.

Arturo Coello (Esp) Agustin Tapia (Arg) vs Alejandro Galan (Esp) Federico Chingotto (Arg) - Men - Fi
programme.desc: Roland-Garros, Philippe-Chatrier. World No.1s Arturo Coello/Agustín Tapia face No.2 Alejandro Galán/Fede Chingotto for Major glory and 2,000 FIP points. Coello/Tapia arrive after straight sets win over Stupaczuk/Lebrón; Galán/Chingotto advanced by shutting down Yanguas/Nieto. Expect Coello/Tapia’s aerial power vs Galán/Chingotto’s countering and first-volley precision. Serve+1 and bandeja depth decide.

programme.desc: Opening sprint where grid spot helps, but nerve at Turn 1 and tidy lines through T3/T9 decide early gains. programme.title: Gemma Triay Pons (Esp) Delfina Brea Senesi (Arg) vs Marta Ortega Gallego (Esp) Tamara Icardo Alcoris
programme.desc: Roland-Garros, Philippe-Chatrier. New World No.1s Gemma Triay/Delfi Brea meet Marta Ortega/Tamara Icardo with the Paris crown and 2,000 FIP points at stake. Triay/Brea reached the final after outlasting Ustero/Araujo; Ortega/Icardo ousted Sánchez/Josemaría in a statement win. Expect Triay/Brea’s aggressive shifts and overhead control against Ortega/Icardo’s structured patterns and backhand-volley accuracy. Net duels and smart lobs will tell.

programme.title: Crvena zvezda vs Celtic - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD1
programme.desc: Crvena Zvezda have met Celtic twice before in major European competition, losing a last 16 tie 6-2 on aggregate in the European Cup in 1968-69. Celtic have lost two of their six European meetings with Serbian sides previously, failing to win any of their three away matches during that time.

Chambery vs Nantes - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: Qatar Club vs Al Shahania - Qatar Stars League 2025/26 - W5
programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. The most famous participating clubs are Al-Sadd, the champions of the last season; Al-Rayyan and Al-Arabi, the popular teams, Al-Duhail and Al-Gharafa, serious contenders for the title every season. The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

programme.title: History of the Asian Games
programme.desc: From its beginnings to today, the Asian Games torch lighting has become a dazzling showcase of creativity and technology. Each edition brings fresh innovation, with Doha 2006’s unforgettable horse-and-rider moment still hailed as a highlight. As the 2026 Games in Japan draw near, excitement builds over what new spectacle will capture the world’s imagination.

programme.title: The Art of lighting the Asian Games Flame
programme.desc: The Asian Games torch lighting has become a stage for innovation, blending tradition with modern spectacle. As the 2026 Games approach in Japan, anticipation grows for the next unforgettable torch lighting ceremony.

programme.title: HL - World series Triathlon - Dubai - Men’s Final
programme.desc: The world's top ranked Olympic champions competed for the titles of the last round ( Dubai ) of the World Triathlon Diamond League in an exciting atmosphere over long distances, including a 2000m swim, 80km cycling and 18km non-stop running. It is worth noting that the total prize money for this round was two million dollars.

programme.title: GP Confidential 2025 Magazine
programme.desc: Explore the sporting secrets of F1. Across 25 episodes and in crisp 3D animations, we analyses the technical details, which decide which teams make the most of the rules - and which need to go back to the drawing board. Complemented by features on historical milestones as well as race previews - GP Confidential is the perfect treat for any F1 fan.

programme.title: Go Ahead Eagles vs FCSB - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD1
programme.desc: Go Ahead Eagles are featuring a major European competition for the first time since the 1965-66 Cup Winners’ Cup first round, when they were eliminated 7-0 on aggregate by Celtic. FCSB have won just one of their seven away major European matches in the Netherlands, beating SC Heerenveen 3-1 in the UEFA Cup in February 2006.

programme.title: Amiens vs St-etienne - French Ligue 2 - 2025/2026
programme.desc: Ligue 2 is the second division of French football. Ligue 2 is contested by 18 clubs, the league operates on a system of promotion and relegation with both Ligue 1 and the third division Championnat National. The teams play 34 games each, totaling 306 games in the season. The biggest games from each match Day are live and exclusive on beIN.

programme.title: Malmö FF vs Ludogorets Razgrad - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD1
programme.desc: Malmö and Ludogorets have met twice before in European competition, with the Swedish side advancing 3-2 on aggregate from a UEFA Champions League qualifying play-off tie in August 2021. Ludogorets have faced Scandinavian opposition 10 times previously in European football, winning just two of those matches and failing to score in five overall.

programme.title: Reims vs Clermont - French Ligue 2 - 2025/2026
programme.desc: Ligue 2 is the second division of French football. Ligue 2 is contested by 18 clubs, the league operates on a system of promotion and relegation with both Ligue 1 and the third division Championnat National. The teams play 34 games each, totaling 306 games in the season. The biggest games from each match Day are live and exclusive on beIN.

programme.title: Sporting Braga vs Feyenoord - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD1
programme.desc: Sporting Braga and Feyenoord have never previously faced – Braga’s last European meeting with a Dutch side was in 2015-16 in the UEFA Europa League group stage, winning 1-0 at home and drawing 0-0 away at FC Groningen. Feyenoord have won two of their last three major European meetings with Portuguese opponents, as many as they’d won in their first 10 against them.
